article.title: SAIC to Research Microwave and Plasma Technologies
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Science Applications International Corp., McLean, Va., is being awarded a $24,525,000 cost-plus-fixed-fee, indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract for high-energy research and applications and high-power microwave and plasma technologies. The contracting activity is the U.S. Air Force Research Laboratory, Kirtland Air Force Base, N.M.
